0.user_question: Carol was playing a trivia game. In the first round she scored 17 points and in the second round she scored 6 points. In the last round she lost 16 points. How many points did she have at the end of the game?

ost_step.1: Identify the number of points Carol earned in the first two rounds combined. She earned 17 points in the first round and 6 points in the second round, so she earned 17 + 6 = 23 points in the first two rounds.
ost_step.2: Subtract the number of points she lost in the third round from the total number of points she earned. She lost 16 points in the third round, so she ended up with 23 (points earned in the first two rounds) - 16 (points lost in the third round) = 7 points at the end of the game.
